data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Elephantomyia Osten Sacken from China, with descriptions of two new species (Diptera, Limoniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Xiao, Li, Yan, Yang, Ding (2015): A review of the genus Elephantomyia Osten Sacken from China, with descriptions of two new species (Diptera, Limoniidae). Zootaxa 3919 (3): 553-572, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3919.3.6
